name: PussyCat City v4
description:
Based on a video by a youtuber named Edukayfun.

This is version 5 of PussyCat City

Play v5

Click to buy wells, trees, houses, etc.

Click on the 5 stars to see your town points.

I decided to make ver 5 newgrounds only.

Changelog:

-Release (4/12/2021): You can just build buildings and houses.

-v0.2 update (5/31/2021): Added wheel of money.

-v0.3 update (9/9/2021) Added town ratings and updated intro.

-v0.4 update (10/27/2021): Bug fixes and made "Zombie Hoards" mod. One bug I fixed was where if you clicked on a building (even if you don't have enough money) would get you another one of that same building making the game EASILY speedrunable.
